description: Tutorial sequence specifications for TutorialSystem integration

module_1_basic_vr.title: Basic VR Controls
module_1_basic_vr.description: Master hand tracking and VR interaction fundamentals

steps.title: Welcome to VR
steps.instruction: Look around using your VR headset. Move your head naturally to explore the environment.
steps.narrator_text: Welcome to your ship, pilot. Let's start with the basics. Look around - you're in virtual reality now.
steps.hint_text: Turn your head left and right, look up and down. Get comfortable with VR movement.

steps.title: Hand Tracking
steps.instruction: Look at your hands. Move them around to see them in VR.
steps.narrator_text: Great! Now look at your hands. These will be your primary way of interacting with the world.
steps.hint_text: Hold your hands in front of your face. Wiggle your fingers!

steps.title: Grabbing Objects
steps.instruction: Reach for the highlighted cube and close your hand to grab it.
steps.narrator_text: Now let's practice grabbing. Reach for the glowing cube and close your hand.
steps.hint_text: Move your hand close to the cube, then make a fist to grab it.

steps.title: Releasing Objects
steps.instruction: Open your hand to release the cube.
steps.narrator_text: Perfect! Now open your hand to let it go.
steps.hint_text: Simply open your fingers to release what you're holding.

steps.title: Choose Movement Type
steps.instruction: Select your preferred locomotion method: Teleport, Smooth, or Snap Turn.
steps.narrator_text: Now let's set up movement. Choose the type that feels most comfortable to you.

options.name: Teleport
options.description: Point and click to teleport - most comfortable for VR newcomers

options.name: Snap Turn
options.description: Rotate in fixed increments - reduces motion sickness

steps.title: Practice Moving
steps.instruction: Move to the three waypoint markers.
steps.narrator_text: Let's practice! Move to each of the glowing markers.
steps.hint_text: Use your chosen movement method to reach each blue marker.

steps.title: Interacting with UI
steps.instruction: Point at the holographic panel and press the button.
steps.narrator_text: Excellent movement! Now let's interact with a UI panel.
steps.hint_text: Point your hand at the panel. A laser will appear. Aim at the button and use your trigger.

steps.title: Comfort Options
steps.instruction: Adjust comfort settings to your preference.
steps.narrator_text: Finally, let's set up comfort options. These help reduce motion sickness.

steps.title: Enter Your Ship
steps.instruction: Walk to your ship and sit in the pilot's seat.
steps.narrator_text: Time to become a pilot. Your ship is waiting. Take a seat at the controls.

steps.title: Cockpit Overview
steps.instruction: Look at the highlighted controls: throttle, flight stick, and panels.
steps.narrator_text: Welcome to your cockpit. Let me show you the essential controls.
steps.hint_text: Look at each highlighted control for a moment.

steps.title: Engine Startup
steps.instruction: Press the engine start button on the main panel.
steps.narrator_text: Let's bring her online. Press the engine start button.

steps.title: Throttle Control
steps.instruction: Grab the throttle and push it forward slowly to increase speed.
steps.narrator_text: Good! Now grab the throttle lever and gently push forward.
steps.hint_text: Grab the left lever and push it forward. Start slow!

steps.title: Pitch Control
steps.instruction: Grab the flight stick and pull back to pitch up, push forward to pitch down.
steps.narrator_text: Now the flight stick. Pull back to pitch up, forward to pitch down.
steps.hint_text: The right stick controls pitch. Pull and push it gently.

steps.title: Roll Control
steps.instruction: Move the flight stick left and right to roll.
steps.narrator_text: Excellent! Now move the stick left and right to roll.

steps.title: Yaw Control
steps.instruction: Twist the flight stick to yaw left and right.
steps.narrator_text: Finally, twist the stick to yaw - that's rotating left and right.
steps.hint_text: Rotate the stick like turning a doorknob.

steps.title: Navigate to Waypoint
steps.instruction: Fly through the three waypoint rings.
steps.narrator_text: Time to put it together! Fly through each ring in sequence.
steps.hint_text: Use all your controls together. Throttle for speed, stick for direction.

steps.title: Station Approach
steps.instruction: Slow down and approach the landing pad marker.
steps.narrator_text: Great flying! Now let's practice approaching a landing pad. Reduce throttle.
steps.hint_text: Pull throttle back to slow down. You need to be under 20 m/s.

steps.title: Landing Procedure
steps.instruction: Land on the designated pad. Keep it gentle!
steps.narrator_text: Final step - land on the pad. Nice and easy does it.
steps.hint_text: Line up with the pad, slow to under 5 m/s, then descend gently.

module_3_combat_training.title: Combat Training
module_3_combat_training.description: Learn weapon systems and combat tactics

steps.title: Weapons Systems
steps.instruction: Locate the weapons controls and fire button.
steps.narrator_text: Welcome to combat training. Let's start with your weapon systems.

steps.title: Target Practice
steps.instruction: Destroy the 5 stationary target drones.
steps.narrator_text: Practice drones deployed. Line them up and fire when ready.
steps.hint_text: Center the target in your crosshair and press the fire trigger.

steps.title: Moving Targets
steps.instruction: Hit 5 moving target drones.
steps.narrator_text: Good shooting! Now try moving targets. Lead your shots!
steps.hint_text: Aim where the target is going, not where it is. Lead your shots!

steps.title: Shield Systems
steps.instruction: Monitor your shield gauge. Recharge shields using the panel control.
steps.narrator_text: Combat isn't just offense. Let's talk defense. Watch your shield indicator.
steps.hint_text: Your shields are the blue bar. Press the shield button to recharge them.

steps.title: Power Management
steps.instruction: Adjust power distribution between weapons, shields, and engines.
steps.narrator_text: Power management is crucial. Balance your systems based on the situation.
steps.hint_text: Use the power distribution sliders. More power = better performance.

steps.title: Evasive Action
steps.instruction: Practice evasive flying. Avoid the incoming fire indicators.
steps.narrator_text: Time to learn evasion. Avoid the red warning zones!
steps.hint_text: Roll, pitch, and yaw to dodge! Keep moving!

steps.title: Target Lock
steps.instruction: Lock onto the marked target and maintain lock for 5 seconds.
steps.narrator_text: Advanced targeting systems can lock onto enemies. Center them and hold.
steps.hint_text: Keep the target in your crosshair for 5 seconds to lock on.

steps.title: Combat Simulation
steps.instruction: Defeat the AI opponent. Use everything you've learned!
steps.narrator_text: Final test! A simulated opponent. Show me what you've learned!
steps.hint_text: Remember: shoot when you have a shot, evade when under fire, manage your power!

module_4_station_ops.title: Station Operations
module_4_station_ops.description: Learn to dock, trade, and accept missions

steps.title: Docking Request
steps.instruction: Use the comms panel to request docking clearance.
steps.narrator_text: Stations require docking permission. Use your communications panel.

steps.title: Docking Guidance
steps.instruction: Follow the holographic guidance markers to your assigned bay.
steps.narrator_text: Clearance granted! Follow the green guidance path to your docking bay.

steps.title: Docking Procedure
steps.instruction: Land in the docking bay. Align with the pad and set down gently.
steps.narrator_text: Almost there. Line up carefully and land smoothly.

steps.title: Exit Your Ship
steps.instruction: Press the exit button to leave your ship.
steps.narrator_text: Perfect landing! Time to explore the station. Exit your ship.

steps.title: Station Navigation
steps.instruction: Navigate to the Trading Floor. Follow the signs.
steps.narrator_text: Let's explore! Find your way to the Trading Floor.
steps.hint_text: Look for signs on the walls. They'll point you to different areas.

steps.title: Trading Interface
steps.instruction: Interact with a vendor. Buy one item and sell one item.
steps.narrator_text: This is where you buy and sell. Try making a purchase and a sale.
steps.hint_text: Approach a vendor terminal. Green prices are buying, red are selling.

steps.title: Mission Board
steps.instruction: Find the Mission Board and browse available missions.
steps.narrator_text: Time to find work! Locate the Mission Board.

steps.title: Accept a Mission
steps.instruction: Select and accept the tutorial mission from the board.
steps.narrator_text: Browse the available missions. Accept the one marked 'Tutorial Mission'.
steps.hint_text: Look for the mission tagged [TUTORIAL]. Select it and press Accept.

steps.title: Return to Ship
steps.instruction: Navigate back to your ship in the docking bay.
steps.narrator_text: Mission accepted! Head back to your ship to begin.

steps.title: Launch Procedure
steps.instruction: Request launch clearance and depart the station.
steps.narrator_text: Ready to launch? Request clearance and take off when clear.

module_5_planet_landing.title: Planetary Operations
module_5_planet_landing.description: Learn planetary landing and surface exploration

steps.title: Planetary Approach
steps.instruction: Approach the planet and enter orbit.
steps.narrator_text: Time to land on a planet! First, achieve stable orbit.

steps.title: Select Landing Site
steps.instruction: Scan the surface and select a marked landing zone.
steps.narrator_text: Scan for a suitable landing zone. Look for the marked area.

steps.title: Atmospheric Entry
steps.instruction: Follow the entry corridor. Keep your ship aligned with the guidance markers.
steps.narrator_text: Beginning atmospheric entry. Stay in the guidance corridor!
steps.hint_text: Entry can be bumpy! Make small corrections, don't overcontrol.

steps.title: Surface Landing
steps.instruction: Land at the designated zone. Watch your descent rate!
steps.narrator_text: Final approach. Reduce speed and land smoothly.

steps.title: Environment Suit
steps.instruction: Equip your environment suit before exiting.
steps.narrator_text: Before you exit, equip your environment suit. The atmosphere may not be breathable.

steps.title: Surface Exploration
steps.instruction: Exit your ship and explore the area. Collect 3 resource samples.
steps.narrator_text: Welcome to the surface! Collect some resource samples nearby.
steps.hint_text: Look for glowing resource nodes. Approach and interact to collect.

steps.title: Weather Systems
steps.instruction: Observe the weather change. Monitor your suit's protection status.
steps.narrator_text: Weather's changing! Keep an eye on your suit's protection indicators.

steps.title: Return to Ship
steps.instruction: Return to your ship.
steps.narrator_text: Good work! Head back to your ship.

steps.title: Surface Launch
steps.instruction: Start engines and launch from the surface.
steps.narrator_text: Time to leave. Start your engines and launch!
steps.hint_text: Full throttle straight up to escape the gravity well!

steps.title: Escape to Orbit
steps.instruction: Ascend through the atmosphere and return to orbit.
steps.narrator_text: Keep climbing! Break through the atmosphere.

module_6_advanced.title: Advanced Systems
module_6_advanced.description: Master ship customization, economy, and progression

steps.title: Ship Customization
steps.instruction: Access the ship customization interface at a station.
steps.narrator_text: Let's talk about upgrading your ship. Dock and access customization.

steps.title: Install an Upgrade
steps.instruction: Install a weapon or system upgrade to your ship.
steps.narrator_text: Choose and install an upgrade. Each will change your ship's capabilities.
steps.hint_text: Browse available upgrades. Select one and click Install.

steps.title: Quest Log
steps.instruction: Open your quest log and review active quests.
steps.narrator_text: Your quest log tracks your missions and objectives. Take a look.

steps.title: Faction Reputation
steps.instruction: Check your faction standings in the reputation screen.
steps.narrator_text: Your actions affect your standing with different factions. Monitor these carefully.

steps.title: Market Dynamics
steps.instruction: Compare prices at two different trading posts.
steps.narrator_text: Smart traders know markets vary! Check prices at different stations.
steps.hint_text: Travel between stations and check their trading interfaces.

steps.title: Profitable Trade Run
steps.instruction: Buy cargo at a station and sell it at another for profit.
steps.narrator_text: Time to make some credits! Buy low, sell high.

steps.title: Character Progression
steps.instruction: Review your pilot level and skill progression.
steps.narrator_text: As you play, you'll level up and unlock new abilities. Check your progress.

steps.title: Tutorial Complete!
steps.instruction: Congratulations! You've completed all tutorial modules.
steps.narrator_text: Outstanding work, pilot! You're ready for the wider universe. Good luck out there!
